articles.description: Antonio Rudiger's current Chelsea contract expires in the summer and is set to leave Stamford Bridge as a free agent - something Thomas Tuchel is desperately trying to avoid
articles.content:
Thomas Tuchel has reiterated that he is confident Antonio Rudiger will sign a new deal as he sent a clear message to the Chelsea star. 
The defender's contract expires in the summer and, as it stand… [+2480 chars]
